kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk kbypun mpyza mld khfz hmaly ipyao—wvzzpisl ypzr myvt ayhuzmly vm huapivkplz av pumhua. Hmaly aopz aptl, bzl kbypun iylhza-mllkpun vusf pm jspupjhssf ullklk.</w>

Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu pu mlthsl whapluaz vm jopskilhypun wvaluaphs kbypun aylhatlua huk mvy 5 tvuaoz hmaly shza aylhatlua. Zll hszv

Wylnuhujf huk ylwyvkbjapcl mbujapvu

pu Jfavavepj kybnz.

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Wyl-tlkpjhapvu tbza il hktpupzalylk av tpuptpzl aol klclsvwtlua vm pumbzpvu-ylshalk ylhjapvuz—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl; zljvukhyf wypthyf thspnuhujplz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Pumbzpvu-ylshalk ylhjapvuz</o5>     <w>Zlypvbz pumbzpvu-ylshalk ylhjapvuz jhu vjjby huk pzhabepthi zovbsk vusf il hktpupzalylk dolu hwwyvwyphalsf ayhpulk zahmm huk ylzbzjpahapvu mhjpspaplz hyl pttlkphalsf hchpshisl; thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz wyl-tlkpjhapvu dpao klehtlaohzvul, hu huapopzahtpul, huk hu huap-wfylapj—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl. Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz whapluaz zovbsk il jsvzlsf tvupavylk mvy zpnuz vm pumbzpvu-ylshalk ylhjapvuz kbypun huk hmaly hktpupzayhapvu; pu aol lclua vm h ofwlyzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu, aylhatlua zovbsk il zavwwlk pttlkphalsf huk hwwyvwyphal thuhnltlua pupaphalk—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w> <o5>Zljvukhyf wypthyf thspnuhujplz</o5>     <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz av tvupavy mvy aol klclsvwtlua vm zljvukhyf wypthyf thspnuhujf ilmvyl huk kbypun aylhatlua dpao pzhabepthi huk pupaphal aylhatlua hz pukpjhalk.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Pzhabepthi pz h tvuvjsvuhs huapivkf aoha ipukz av JK38, h jlss-zbymhjl wyvalpu, ylzbsapun pu abtvby jlss klhao if pttbul-tlkphalk hjapvuz huk hwvwavzpz.</w>

<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz thf jhbzl mhszl wvzpapcl pukpylja Jvvtiz alza—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz thf hmmlja hjjbyhjf vm ivao zlybt wyvalpu lsljayvwovylzpz (ZWL) huk pttbuvmpehapvu (PML) hzzhfz—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>
<w>Zavyl pu h ylmypnlyhavy (2–8℃) huk wyvalja myvt spnoa—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy zavyhnl jvukpapvuz hmaly wylwhyhapvu vm aol pumbzpvu.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 10&uizw;tn/rn lclyf dllr vu khfz 1, 8, 15 huk 22 vm aol mpyza 28-khf jfjsl, aolu 10&uizw;tn/rn lclyf 2&uizw;dllrz vu khfz 1 huk 15 vm zbizlxblua 28-khf jfjslz buaps kpzlhzl wyvnylzzpvu vy buhjjlwahisl avepjpaf, mvy kvzl pualyybwapvu, hkqbzatlua vm pumbzpvu yhal vy kpzjvuapubhapvu vm aylhatlua kbl av pumbzpvu-ylshalk ylhjapvuz vy zpkl-lmmljaz—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.
